newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: First Holdings forays into construction.
newsitem.headline: First Holdings forays into construction.

text.p: First Philippine Holdings Corp said on Thursday it would set up a joint venture construction company with Balfour Beatty Ltd, a civil engineering unit of BICC Plc of the United Kingdom.
The joint venture is expected to be finalised by the third week of May. No other details were available.
First Holdings said in a statement First Philippine Balfour Beatty is positioning to become a major player in the domestic engineering and construction industry.
First Holdings has major interests in power distribution, oil exploration, real estate and infrastructure.
